reviewText: I didn't discover this series until the third season but I got hooked on it immediately.  I found the rich characterizations and amazingly well-written, intertwining storylines in "Rogue" to be absolutely addictive. But I frankly struggled to cope with the realization that the show was ending after the fourth season because, quite simply, I had not had enough. So, I was elated to find this DVD on Amazon with the first two seasons packaged together. I am currently savoring the opportunity to binge-watch the beginning and sophomore seasons of this marvelous production very soon!
bought on a whim was delighted after watching the two seasons
